name: Tower Defense 3D
description:
Defend the team's base with the Party's members: Bean Cruise, Donkey Bomb and Laser Cat!

Controls: 

Mouse(Put a "Bean" and move the Camera),

WASD(Move the Camera),      

C(Stop the Camera Movements), 

Escape and P(Pause the Game), 

R(restart),  

U(Speed UP Time).
